title: Add AI-powered personalized task generation with user profile and progressive difficulty

requirements.text: Create user profile setup interface with questionnaire capturing physical capabilities (fitness level, mobility, endurance), health conditions (injuries, limitations, chronic conditions), current habits (sleep schedule, exercise frequency, work schedule), and lifestyle preferences
acceptanceCriteria: Multi-step form or wizard interface for profile creation
Fields for fitness level (beginner/intermediate/advanced)
Input for health conditions and physical limitations
Current habits questionnaire (exercise, sleep, productivity patterns)
Profile data is saved and accessible for editing
Profile completion unlocks AI task generation

requirements.text: Implement backend data model for storing user profile information including physical capabilities, health conditions, habits, and preferences with persistent storage
acceptanceCriteria: Motoko type definitions for UserProfile with all profile fields
Stable storage for user profiles that persists across upgrades
CRUD operations for profile management
Profile data validation and sanitization
Association between user identity and profile

requirements.text: Build AI task generation algorithm that analyzes user profile data (fitness level, health conditions, habits) to create personalized daily tasks appropriate for the user's current capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Task generation considers user's fitness level and health limitations
Tasks align with user's stated habits and lifestyle
Generated tasks span multiple categories (fitness, mental, productivity)
Tasks are actionable and time-bounded
Variety in generated tasks to prevent monotony

requirements.text: Implement progressive difficulty scaling system that tracks user completion history, current level, and stat improvements to automatically increase task challenge over time
acceptanceCriteria: System tracks completion rates and patterns for each user
Task difficulty increases when user consistently completes tasks
Difficulty scaling respects user's physical limitations from profile
Tasks become more challenging as user's stats improve
Adaptive pacing prevents burnout from too-rapid progression
Algorithm considers recent performance (last 7-14 days)

requirements.text: Create automatic daily quest generation that converts AI-generated tasks into mandatory daily quests in the user's quest log each day
acceptanceCriteria: System generates 3-5 personalized quests daily based on user profile
Generated quests automatically appear in the daily quests interface
Quests are marked as AI-generated with special indicator
Quest difficulty and XP rewards scale with user level
Quest generation runs automatically at daily reset time
Users cannot dismiss or opt-out of AI-generated quests

requirements.text: Add backend task history tracking system that stores completion data, performance metrics, and timestamps to inform future AI task generation
acceptanceCriteria: Store completion timestamps for all tasks and quests
Track success/failure rates per task category
Record time-to-completion for tasks
Maintain rolling window of recent performance (30 days minimum)
Data is queryable by AI generation algorithm
History influences difficulty scaling decisions

requirements.text: Integrate AI-generated quests with existing voice control system allowing users to complete AI quests via voice commands
acceptanceCriteria: Voice commands work with AI-generated quests
TTS announces AI-generated quest completions
Voice feedback indicates progressive difficulty increases
Users can query their AI-generated quests via voice

requirements.text: Display user profile summary and AI personalization status on dashboard showing current fitness level, active limitations, and next difficulty progression milestone
acceptanceCriteria: Profile summary panel on main dashboard
Visual indicator of current difficulty level
Progress bar or metric showing progress toward next difficulty tier
Quick access to edit profile settings
Display of AI-generated quest stats (completion rate, streak)

constraints: Do not integrate external AI/ML services (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Task generation must use rule-based algorithms only, not machine learning models
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
Respect existing Web Speech API integration patterns
Keep Solo Leveling-inspired visual design consistent
nonGoals: True machine learning or neural network-based AI
Integration with external fitness tracking devices or APIs
Social features or task sharing between users
Nutrition tracking or meal planning features
Medical advice or health diagnosis capabilities
